# llms.txt for Speed-Proof

site: https://speed-proof.com
title: Speed-Proof | Airline, Driving & Hiking Modes
description: Speed-Proof is a GPS-free navigation app designed for off-grid travel, including Airplane Mode, Driving Mode, and Hiking Mode. It uses magnetometer and compass-based tracking to deliver altitude, speed, and location without relying on satellites.

documentation: https://speed-proof.com/User-Manual.html
privacy_policy: https://speed-proof.com/privacy.html
contact: speedproofapp@gmail.com

keywords: speedproof, gps-free navigation, magnetometer, hiking app, airline mode, driving mode, altitude tracking, offline speed tracker, compass-only navigation, return-to-origin
